Hi-i have read the documentation, installed junit3.8.1 and set my 
classpaths properly. still i get the error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 
junit/textui/TestRunner

and 

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 
junit/samples/Alltests




When i try to test the sample classes. My classpaths refer to the 
whole junit directory, and i even tried putting in individual paths 
to all the executable jar files i could find in the release. 

Whats wrong???????
it doesn't say anywhere??

Regards, 
Ro
